name: The Circuit of Life
description:
A professional AI developer is provided a secret project to create a solution-oriented artificial intelligence that could solve food scarcity and sustainable agriculture. All seems normal, but a security glitch starts a snowball effect of problematic behaviors, and the AI begins to have a change of plans regarding saving the world. 

The interactive nature of this game has its consumers in mind regarding the development of immersive gameplay, real-world topics of concern, and societal representation of the future.

None of the characters in this game represent real or existing people or persons.

This game can be completed within 10-20 minutes.

Publisher Name:

Meanie Panini Media

Maturity Rating: Some of the conversational material in this game may be better suited for a mature audience.

Languages:
English

Competition Type:

Single Player

Controller Style: Keyboard
